title: Chesters triumph in honor of her prince As it was performed vpon S. Georges Day 1610. in the foresaid citie.
author: Davies, Richard, fl. 1610.
publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for I. B[rowne] and are to be sold in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleete-streete,
notes: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Verse by Davies, with a description of the pageant staged in honor of Henry Frederick Prince of Wales by Robert Amerie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
